author: Marcin Kugla
title: The Quest for ADA
description: Building the first mobile classic fantasy MRPG Game in a world called ADA. **Fully related** game design to Cardano´s blockchain technology.

assessments.note: They try to get attention for Cardano over a play game. I think this is a smart and creative move.

In my opinion a mass adoption for Cardano is essential, with this kind of project we as a community getting a chance to bring some fun beside all the other serious projects out there. So yes the Quest for Ada addresses the challenge (end user value) definitely effective!
I'm very excited about this kind of game that uses NFTs. Your ideas and story sound great. What does the M stand for MRPG?
This proposal addresses Cardano Fund 5: DApps & Integrations Challenge. The project proposal is solid and can impact many people seeking to play game that are built on the Blockchain.
Yes I think it is modern and up to date. With enough support it could be a real success and good form of marketing for Cardano.
The plan and most notably the experience of the team will allow a successful implementation of this project.

The experience of the team is impressive and it's great that you run a stake pool. I think this game will be successful. Korean should be added to the list of languages. Young Koreans love this kind of game and are knowledgeable about crypto. I could help with this as I live in Korea.

There is not really a plan except to develop an adventure game that somehow links to ADA. What platforms will it be on? What is the tokenomics in the game? Can the prospers back up the significant experience claims made (linkedIn profiles?). We don't even have a surname for Dirk?
It is likely for this proposal to be implemented because the project plan is straightforward, and the team has experience in the gaming industry.
After reading all the informations about the idea and the plannings around I think it is a realistic project. With enough support it could be a real success!

As mentioned before, the information provided and the exact addressing of the challenge (end user value, mass adoption, higher awareness, bigger media reach) let this project look more then feasible and make it easy to assess it.
The stake pool and in-game marketplace should help long-term funding for this game How will you overcome multi-accounts and bots? PRISM might be an option.
$100,000 is a lot to ask for without a serious game development plan? What are the game mechanics?

solution: We will offer the whole fantasy gaming experience, story, **exclusively hand-drawn artworks**, world and game design will be fully hand-made!
